::Najah::

Najah still hold Lady hawk's body, his stomach started growl every 
time more like his impatient to kill the hen that he was holing on.

"Excusssss me, massster " hissed Najah trying to do his tone one that 
convince at Zardus give him the command that let him eat at last "I 
didn't being sssseem rude but... regarding that I didn't eat anything 
ssssssince thisssss morning and it'ssss ssssunsset and hold thissss 
bird  give me hungry... could be thisss interrogation quick, 
pleasssse???" and a sudden idea crossed snake's mind "you could 
usssse torture chamber... and happily i could help"

--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, "CYBERWOLF4" <cyberwolf4@p...> wrote:
> Lady Hawk frowned, obviously Squizzy had denied wanting credit for 
her
> experiments. "I attacked the mongoose because I thought she had 
intentions
> on my experiments." An echo filled her head as she could have sworn 
that
> she'd used this argument before. "She is the only one who 
understood them
> and the only one capable of stealing them, If she took over then 
you'd no
> longer have use for me." Lady Hawk smiled a wicked smile in the 
crack of her
> beak, "I know what happens to bots that have worn out thier use."
> 
> 
> ----- Original Message -----
> From: <Yanshosh@a...>

> Subject: Re: Are they at the new alliance base or the IF?

> > ::Zardus/Repressor::
> >
> > Zardus shakes his head. "He will at the conference room," he says,
> > walking off toward the conference room and motioning for Najah to
> > follow, "But I would like to know why you attacked Squizzy."
> >
> > He frowns, the Iron Fist intercepting some comm activity near the
> > base. Listening to one transmission, his eyes narrow. So, HotRod
> > wanted Feline reprogrammed...
> >
> > "Repressor," he says into his comm, "Go to Feline's position and 
have
> > her report to the lab. If HotRod objects, open fire. The base
> > defences will help you."
> >
> > Pushing a button on his wrist comp, the old Alliance base goes 
into
> > lockdown, the exit and all the blast doors closing.
> > ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
> > Repressor lands near Feline as he recieves Zardus' orders.
> >
> > "Zardus wants you to report to the lab, he told me to make sure 
you
> > get there."
> >
> >
> >

> > > Lady Hawk looked straight at Zardus, he was getting cocky. He
> > didn't think
> > > she could do any damage while she was wrapped up. He was wrong. 
If
> > she were
> > > to open her mouth and shriek right now the Alliance would be
> > looking for a
> > > new leader. Unfortunately that also meant that Veratis would be
> > looking for
> > > a new daughter.

heald
> > all the
> > > cards. She had to run a bluff and hope to cut her losses. "Have 
the
